thread.title: Mary Reik
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Mary Reik

author: Mary Reik
title: Mary Reik
text: I ordered a book offered by Thriftbooks through Amazon. Unfortunately, though the book they had was pictured it was under the wrong Amazon description, so I got a book I did not want. When I contacted Thriftbooks, I got a very prompt, courteous response and a quick refund of my money. It was really an Amazon problem, but was nicely resolved by Thriftbooks.
